name: Arum dracontium
Relationship: Arum Italicum. (Brain-fag, with headache in occipital region.) Arum maculatum (inflammation and ulceration of mucous membranes. Nasal irritation with polypus).

Head: Heavy; shooting pain in ears, aching pain behind right ear
Respiratory: Hoarseness; excess of mucus in larynx
Throat: Loose cough worse at night on lying down
Irresistible desire to pass urine, burns and smarts
Croupy, hoarse cough with sore throat

details: A remedy for Pharyngitis with sore, raw and tender throat.
